author: amassari
msg: Normalize the attribute values before collapsing whitespace, or the special characters used to signal the usage of an entity reference inside an attribute value will remain in the value of xsi:type and xsi:nill (XERCESC-1945)

msg: [ARIES-429] Add an option on the <cm:property-placeholder/> element to reload the whole blueprint container if the configuration changes
